text: I think he is someone who has connected
with everyday Americans like no one
since Ronald Reagan
Mike Pence is a profoundly religious
highly moral lawmaker from the Midwest
Donald Trump is none of those things
social conservatism is his calling card
Mike Pence represents committed
opposition to things like gay marriage
unfettered access to abortion in a lot
of the debates over religious freedom he
has been a firm ally of those who feel
like a liberal culture is encroaching on
the values of traditional America
Republicans need to renew our commitment
to the timeless principles of our party
Mike Pence will help Donald Trump appeal
to the kind of voter that he naturally
wouldn't have much of an appeal to
Donald Trump is going to provide the
kind of leadership that America needs
Donald Trump is a showman Mike Pence is
something of a vanilla political entity
he's not anyone's version of exciting
that Donald Trump has chosen him for
different reasons than I'm simply
looking for someone who's a lot like me
I really believe that civility is
essential to the survival of the
Republic he's basically unblemished in
his personal life and that alone brings
a new dimension to a campaign that by
all accounts has at its core kind of a
flawed complicated messy figure
